Hey guys !

This is my replica of the Dassault Mirage III, a french fighter jet.

To flight this jet, you must select the cockpit and click control from here

Have fun !

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/u6124uaekpnffuh/Dassault%20Mirage%20III.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/u6124uaekpnffuh/Dassault%20Mirage%20III.craft?dl=0)
